org.aopalliance.intercept

接口 MethodInvocation

  • 所有超级接口:
    Invocation, Joinpoint

    public interface MethodInvocation
extends Invocation
    Description of an invocation to a method, given to an interceptor upon method-call.

    A method invocation is a joinpoint and can be intercepted by a method interceptor.

    另请参阅:
    MethodInterceptor

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Method getMethod()
      Get the method being called.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.aopalliance.intercept.Joinpoint

        getStaticPart, getThis, proceed

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMethod

        Method getMethod()
        Get the method being called.

        This method is a frienly implementation of the Joinpoint.getStaticPart() method (same result).

        返回:
        the method being called
